bootable.description:
Enables or disables the bootable attribute. You can boot an
instance from a bootable volume.

host.description: The OpenStack Block Storage host where the existing volume resides.

ref.description:
A reference to the existing volume. The internal structure of this
reference is dependent on the implementation of the volume driver,
see the specific driver's documentation for details of the required
elements in the structure.

metadata.description:
One or more metadata key and value pairs to associate with the
volume.
